User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b7) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b7
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b7) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b7

I notice the ‘New Tab’ context menu item has gone from Fx4 Beta 7.  I would like to suggest a more useful alternative: ‘New Tab Here’.  This would add a blank tab just right of the tab the user right-clicked – VERY useful!

Also, I suggest adding the new New Tab icon to this and the context menu for hyperlinks.  You’ve switched round the order in Fx4 so that ‘Open Link in New Tab’ is at the top.  This is logical, but will frustrate millions of users for weeks while they get used to it.  With the icon to its left, most of that frustration can be avoided.

Finally, there is no + to the right of the tabs if there are more than about 9 open.  This is presumably a bug, and I hope it can be fixed prior to final release.

Reproducible: Didn't try
comments.author: beneficentone@gmail.com
